Name: Waltz of the Wizard (Legacy demo)
About the game: The product on this page is a legacy demo version of Waltz of the Wizard and was originally created in 2016, as a prototype to showcase the power of room-scale VR. The full product, Waltz of the Wizard: Natural Magic contains hours of content, receives frequent free updates, showcases the latest in VR technologies such as hand-tracking, voice interaction, full-body gestures and recently won the 'Best Updated Game' category in UploadVRâ€™s Best Of 2021 Awards. /
